title: Ketu Transit in the 6th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your sixth house brings detachment from conflict, competition, and constant problem-solving. You may feel less interested in proving yourself through struggle or comparison, preferring quiet efficiency instead. Health awareness increases, but symptoms can feel vague or psychosomatic if ignored. This phase supports releasing old habits, debts, and mental burdens. When approached consciously, Ketu here helps you rise above enemies, stress, and routines by simplifying life and acting with inner discipline.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Reduced interest in rivalry or confrontation.
Preference for calm over constant effort.
Problems feel easier to detach from.

sections.heading: Career
points: Work is done efficiently without display.
Service roles feel routine but manageable.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Peace matters more than winning arguments.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Debts or dues may reduce quietly.

closing: Ketu in the 6th house dissolves unnecessary struggle. When resistance drops, life becomes lighter and more manageable.
